level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 2-1226.40b.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-188
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-188, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 8-101.04.
